name: test-template
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'uv venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && if [ -f requirements.txt ]; then uv pip install -r requirements.txt; fi && if [ -f requirements-dev.txt ]; then uv pip install -r requirements-dev.txt; fi'
postStartCommand: bash -lc 'git config --global --add safe.directory ${containerWorkspaceFolder} || true; pre-commit install || true'
